info.title: nx-locale-switcher
info.author: HamletDuFromage
info.description: Changes the locale for specific titles on your Nintendo Switch
info.details: A Nintendo Switch homebrew app that allows you to change the language and region of your games on a per-title basis, directly from your console. This makes use of Atmosphère's per-game settings overriding. As such, this WILL NOT work on any other CFW.
